website_summaries.verdict: There's no stopping the Three Stripes in releasing tour-ready pieces that stand out on the course. This version may have injected minor changes, but based on the reaction of users, these modifications were highly welcomed. The introduction of the Primeknit upper proposes breathability and comfort. The Boost midsole serves as an excellent match as it elevates the comfort throughout the game season.
pros: A high percentage of consumers claim that the Adidas Tour360 XT Primeknit is an extremely comfortable shoe
Some of the commenters charge the incredible comfort of the sole to the Boost technology
Several customers highly commend the knit upper for its breathability and comfort
A few individuals are delighted that they can rely on the traction of this Adidas golf shoe
It gives a no-slip feel even on wet courses
A couple of users find the modern styling aesthetically-pleasing
One mentions that this spiked golf shoe delivers substantial support
A golfer is happy that this item is reasonably priced
cons: One thinks that this item could improve in delivering lateral support

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The sole started coming apart from the shoe with less than 10 rounds out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Leeper

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great and was very comfortable until about the third hole when it started to rub the back of my ankle. I’ll definitely keep them I just have to wear a higher sock or put a band aid on the back of my ankle. Other than that they are great it’s probably just my left foot is different or something because it didn’t bother my right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoe on market right now
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe with excellent traction fit for any conditions. No issue with tightness around top of foot that some other reviewers have noted. Infinitely better than the overpriced garbage golf shoes that Nike has put out over the past 12 months, and that’s coming from a Nike loyalist.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Graham Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Recipe for some serious blisters
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's just my foot - but these shoes don't secure your foot one bit. They're super slick and look great, even enjoy the sock knit opening and feels nice on the foot. But take one step and with each step your foot pops in and out of the shoe, nightmare for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof golf shoes I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes and are indeed waterproof. They only downside that I have noticed is that my feet got a little colder than normal because they are lightweight material. Also get lots of compliments on the looks. I paid about $110 for them which made them a good value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not supportive.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a novice but still use spikes. They were very comfortable but didn’t think the material provided enough support for my Bryson-style swings. The full leather version is probably the way to go but they are pricey.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and great traction
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up after mgs best of 2020 spiked shoes guide reviewed them. I like this shoe. Found it to be comfortable for waking, has great grip. Feel more secure than my previous shoe Nike Lunar Control. I did order half a size smaller but that is common for me some shoes I fit into 12.5 and some into 13s
customer_reviews.author: Arpit Gupta

customer_reviews.title: too hard to get your foot in the shoe
customer_reviews.text: and is not the most comfortable BUT great grip for those who need balance
customer_reviews.author: Daniyal Hameed

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: runs a bit small, should go a half size bigger. Adidas should work on making its shoes fit the same. I fit a size 43.5 forgefiber boa but need to have the 44 360tour.
customer_reviews.author: Luka

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: “Those are the freshest golf shoes I have ever seen” - everyone I golfed with on Sunday
customer_reviews.author: River Soles

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes, disliked the higher price when purchasing a replacement pair 4 days later
customer_reviews.text: As the heading says, shoes are great. Only problem was when I went to order a slightly larger size (.5) to find the price had increased by 48.5%....bummer. Still needed the larger size so I suppose I had no other choice but to eat the difference or find a new pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Luciani

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome if you like a stretch sock type of sneaker. Good grip. Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: lou ann

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than leather Tour360
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of the leather Tour360. These were so narrow I couldn’t even get a foot into the sock opening. I searched endlessly for Wide sizes, not to be found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good butttt
customer_reviews.text: Good golf shoe for those who want the runners shoe feel. Only exception is the holes in the back of the heel that develop very quickly, had mine for 3 months before this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mattera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and exciting.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was on time, the shoe fits perfectly and comfortably. I recommend the Adidas tour 360 XT primeknit shoe for any golfer who walks 9 or 18 holes.
customer_reviews.author: James Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are among the best golf shoes I've ever worn. They required no break-in -- they wear like socks once you get the laces adjusted right. Getting them on was also a bit of a challenge until I got the laces adjusted, but once they are on, they are VERY comfortable. And a great price with the sale ...
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great but they sent me a pair with a stain on them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great but they sent me a pair that were stained. I would have sent them back but needed them this week and did not have the time to send them back. Disappointed to pay full price for these
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: These feel better than any running shoe I own. They're by far my favorite pair of "cleats" for any sport I've ever played! they look amazing too. they fit amazing around your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel T.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my dad for his birthday since he is a hardcore golfer. I know he has worn other golf shoes, but I wasn't sure if he had a preference when it came to brand or style. After receiving these, he told me this is his favorite brand and that he loves these shoes. He told me the shoe fits perfectly and that they are comfortable and his feet feel great even after walking most of the course. The shoes are lightweight, breathable, and they provide nice traction and support. Since I'm not a golfer, I can only go off his opinion, and he says he highly recommends these to all golfers.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2three

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Comfort, Looks, and Performance
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these golf shoes. The sock-like design makes them very easy to slip on and off without having to tie & untie them. The provide a great fit that conforms well to my foot without having to be worn too tight. I was a bit worried that the fabric material on the outside might allow moisture through, but there's a membrane layer on the inside that keeps water out. The soles are super comfortable with good support. They feel just as good as any running shoes I've worn. Traction is top notch. They look good too, with a stylish and modern athletic vibe. Love everything about these - awesome comfort, looks, and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Doggymcnuggets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes for golf or grass volleyball
customer_reviews.text: One reviewer said that these shoes run small. I disagree. They fit me just as expected. Although a lot of reviewers show photos, very few show just how prominent the studs or spikes are on these shoes. They are meant for golf, but I use them to play grass volleyball because they give impressive traction. The price is quite reasonable and they seem to be quite resistant to water. I hope the photos are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Tapon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe
customer_reviews.text: These gold shoes are actually visually beautiful. It sounds weird to say about a shoe, I know. But they are. For us, they fit perfectly... a little snug but the fibers loosened up like any other shoe after a few wears. They shoes are very comfortable and they spikes on them bottom work perfectly on the green. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I moved from my old Adidas golf shoes which were pretty narrow at the toe to these. I usually ware ultra boost shoes daily and they feel just like that, but for the golf course. Super comfortable and fit like a regular shoe. the mid foot is locked down really well, which is great. I don't know about the water proofing but says they are for at least the 1st year. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: adam O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not good on hilly courses
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and nice looking. True to size. U wear a 7 men’s. However, not much lateral support on hilly stance. I wear them in flat courses. I use adidas code chaos size 8 since they run narrow in toe box on hilly ones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pham

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable & True To Size
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Adidas Golf Shoes and these do not disappoint. Very cushioned insoles, good looking, great quality AND their Waterproof.. Awesome..
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdogs&Poodles=SheepaDoodles

customer_reviews.title: Adidas golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylish golf shoes. Can't go wrong with the Adidas brand. True to size and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: I love Jewelry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good traction, and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are true to size. I wear a size 9 running shoe and these are the right size for me. Also, I have slightly wide feet, and for some shoes I wear a wide. But these uppers are so soft and stretchy that they fit perfectly. The downside is that there is not much support from the upper. It is easier to roll your ankle in these. They fit more like slippers or socks... the laces don’t do too much. The midsole is very comfortable and supportive. And I feel like the spikes provide good traction. I also appreciate how the shoes are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Tour360 Xt Primeknit Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: These men's golf shoes feature a premium knit upper for adaptive support and a soft feel for 18 holes. The responsive boost midsole returns energy on every swing. The outsole provides enhanced traction and grip for stability around the greens.
feature_bullets: Full length boost midsole for ultimate comfort and energy return
adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot in adaptive support, ultralight comfort and is engineered from heel to toe for unrivaled softness that enhances touch and feel
X-shaped primary traction element with deep flex grooves
